src:
Tanda-Tanda Liverpool Siap Jadi Juara Premier League Musim Ini
04 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Comeback dramatis Liverpool atas Aston Villa (2-1) akhir pekan lalu dinilai sebagai indikasi kuat calon juara Premier League musim ini. The Reds dianggap sudah memenuhi setiap kriteria untuk mengangkat trofi idaman tersebut.
Pada laga tersebut, tim asuhan Jurgen Klopp sempat tertinggal 0-1 terlebih dahulu. Situasi sulit, Liverpool tertekan sampai ujung laga. Akhirnya, mereka bisa mencetak dua gol balasan di menit ke-87 dan 90+4.
Tercatat, ini merupakan kali ketiga beruntun Liverpool mencetak gol dalam 15 menit terakhir untuk mengamankan poin. Artinya, skuad The Reds terbukti memiliki mentalitas tangguh yang tidak dimiliki sembarang tim.
Itulah sebabnya Liverpool diyakini siap jadi juara musim ini. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Signs of Liverpool are Ready to Become Premier League Champions this Season
Nov 04 2019, 15:00 by Bola.net
Liverpool - Liverpool's dramatic comeback over Aston Villa (2-1) last weekend was seen as a strong indication of the prospective Premier League champions this season. The Reds are considered to have fulfilled every criteria to lift the dream trophy.
In that match, Jurgen Klopp's team were behind 0-1 first. Difficult situation, Liverpool depressed to the end of the fight. Finally, they can score two replies in the 87th minute and 90 + 4.
Noted, this is the third time in a row Liverpool scored in the last 15 minutes to secure the points. That is, the Reds squad proved to have a tough mentality that is not owned by just any team.
That is why Liverpool are believed to be ready to be champions this season. Read below, Bolaneters!
